title: Graying of America since the 1970s - effect

content.question: The “graying” of America since the 1970s is widely seen as threatening which of the following?

choices.label: The consumer culture of American society
The long-term viability of the social security system
Voter turnout in local and national elections

content.answer: The long-term viability of the social security system

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
